1.1.0.name: wordpress/auto-tag-suggest
1.1.0.description:
For the fastest and most efficient post tagging - whether single post or sitewide!

Retrieves, combines and ranks related tag suggestions from four different tagging services at once, giving you a clickable list to choose from as well as a tag editing box on your post writing page.

Uses TagTheNet, Alchemy, Yahoo Term Extraction and Zemanta APIs for your post content to retrieve the most relevent tags and then puts them all together using a simple scoring algorithm.

Similar to Simple Tagging click box which accesses each of these services separately, but providing much faster and more integrated list, making tagging your posts almost automatic.

Includes sitewide post tag list with a mass tag suggestion feature, enabling you to scan for tag suggestions for all your posts with the click of a button and edit them all from the one page.
